name: Maze Drifter - GMTK Jam 2020
description:
Solo 2 day game jam project.

2D puzzle game where inputs move every movable object.

Use blue block for your advantage and avoid  orange ones.

Get the ball to the checkered flag and beat 8 levels.

HOW TO PLAY

WASD - move objects. Object will move only when the ball is stationary.

R - restart level

ESC - quit the game

NOTE

Sorry for object overlapping.  Didn't have much time and energy to solve what the actual F was happening there... ¯\_(ツ)_/¯  Hit R and restart level if shit break lmao.
